content: knitted drops hat for men with cables and texture in lima drops extra 0-1133 drops design pattern no li-058 yarn group b size s/m head circumference 57/59 cm / 22½ /23 1/4 materials drops lima from garnstudio 100 g color no 7810 moss green drops double pointed needles and circular needle 40 cm / 16 size 4 mm/us 6 - or size needed to get 21 sts x 28 row in stockinette st = 4 x 4 10 x 10 cm drops circular needle 40 cm / 16 size 3 5 mm/us 4 for rib worked in the round on circular needle/double pointed needles
